title: Encumbered
data: {{obsolete}} ''For armour encumbrance, which still exists in the game, see [[encumbrance rating]].'' The encumbered [[status effect]] occurs when you carried more than 100 + (25 * strength) [[aum]]. It causes the following effects: *climbing [[stairs]] takes 1 extra turn *+1 to [[movement]] delay *+2 [[hunger]] per action *[[Stealth]] is halved *slows [[Unarmed Combat]] ==History== *In [[0.15]], the encumbered status effect (and item weight in general) was removed.
